title: My Client keeps Crashing
body: I am playing League for quite some time now and this has never happened to me, until the latest patch.. Everytime I'm trying to play League after a minute or so the client says "trying to reconnect", my internet connection is stable and fast, I can still for example google stuff and use the internet but just the Client tries to reconnect. it happens if i just have it open, in champ select and in Queue. As soon as I am in a game all is good. I'd really appreciate some help on this topic. I am not sure if it has to do with the patch.

replies.body: i am having the same problem with my client but it just crashes over and over again , its not losing network connection it just keeps crashing . i did a full repair , i uninstalled and reinstalled mutiple times but it still crashes . please help meee this is soo much bs

My guess it's some sorta of bug within the client causing these disconnects, I have been dealing with a similar problem as well. My Client will randomly disconnect me from game and keep me from reconnecting for a good 10 to 15 mins unless I reset my router. Thing is I use two computers one for music and discord and another for League. The pc I use for music never ends up disconnecting from the internet, where the one I'am playing on freaks out if i try reconnecting. So I know for sure it has something to do with the client. Secondly, when I do reconnect I have to deal with riot's stupid Leaverbuster. So far Support hasn't been much help, telling me that they -themselves have no clue what may be causing these crashes.
I have a twenty minute wait time bc of this. It's the second time too.

It sounds like your network is having a hard time keeping it's connection to our matchmaking servers, but once you're connected to the individual game server you don't have any issues. It's good that you're able to stay connected in games, but let's see if we can get to the bottom of those "trying to reconnect" messages. 

Let's try going through our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) first to rule out some of those possibilities. Hit me back up if that doesn't help!
